repl_description:
Interactive website featuring a dynamic hero section with meteor animations and collapsible sidebar navigation. The platform implements comprehensive resource management with filtering capabilities, search functionality, and structured content organization through resource cards and categories.

Core Components:
- Dynamic hero section with meteor animations (magicui.design)
- Collapsible sidebar navigation
- Resource management system with filtering
- Gesture-based interactions
- Search functionality with loading states
- Component-based content organization

Technologies:
- magicui.design
- React/TypeScript
- Gesture interaction system
- Component-based architecture
